QueryResult.text: select srm_companies.id odf_pk, SRM_COMPANIES.ID as company_key, srm_companies.COMPANY_ID as company_id, srm_companies.COMPANY_NAME as company_name, srm_companies.STATUS as company_status_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'CMP_COMPANY_STATUS' and rownum = 1 and ID = srm_companies.STATUS) as company_status_caption, srm_companies.created_date as clarity_created_date, srm_companies.last_updated_date as clarity_updated_date, dataw_context.language_code, dataw_context.id language_id from srm_companies srm_companies inner join cmn_languages dataw_context on dataw_context.id = dataw_context.id where 1 = 1 and dataw_context.is_dw_enabled=1
